```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(sqldf)

library(pander)

library(knitr)


setwd("C:/Users/kevin/Dropbox/GetReal/Data/sqlite")

getReal_2016db<- dbConnect(SQLite(), dbname="outcome_history.sqlite")

```


```{r}

attr_1 <- select(attr, 46:49)


names(attr_1)

str(attr_1)

attr_1 <- lapply(attr_1, factor, levels=c("Don't Know/Prefer Not to say","Strongly Disagree", "Disagree", "Disagree a little","Agree a little", "Agree", "Strongly Agree" ), ordered=TRUE)

str(attr_1)

attr_1 <- lapply(attr_1,table)

pander(attr_1)




```
